header.rec_loc: In mine and ANON's flat, Sussex
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Money, bikes, travel, spices, the kitchen, accessories, nuts, the flat, seeing family, plastic bags, work, window cleaning, pronunciation of scones, cream tea, cholesterol, senescence & centenarians, diverticulitis, bad habits, premonitions, friends, gambling, master's degrees, Brighton, utility bills, borrowing money, benefits.
header.activity: ANON's parents' first time visit to our flat in Sussex
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, anecdote telling, making arrangements, telling jokes
